Posts.Title: Lympth nodes

Posts.Content: Hi B, i had 3 Fec sessions n after the first shot my hair started to die. So made the decission to go n have my head shaved as going out in the wind really used to hut my scalp. But everyone is ifferant!! i was quite lucky as I didn't have side effects other than my hair. well done on. It going for the pic line though, only reason they like them as it takes the hard work away from them putting your canula in. Plus your more prone to blood clots so stick to your guns I did. so you just havering fec then no dozeytaxul? take care B x
Posts.Title: 1st chemo, how soon for side effects to show

Posts.Content: Hi, thank you you for your reply . I am pleased your onco said no it carries a lot of risks n it's one extra thing you DNt need.  So after your 6 fec chemos what next for you?  Kat xx
Posts.Title: 1st chemo, how soon for side effects to show

Posts.Content: Hi every one just a quick question. Had surgery back in sept and sentinel lympth node biopsey. All nodes came back negative do I still need to worry?
Posts.Title: Lympth nodes

Posts.Content: Hi, I have had 6 chemos 3 of which were FECT  n 3 dozeytaxul . Had oncolplastic surgey which surgeon says was the best result pathalogoy they had seen n no nodes effected although 5 were removed as 4 turned blue a fifth was a slight tinge in corner so my surgeon removed it. I have 15 rads set up at end of month but I still worry about the what ifs? Am I been silly and should stop worrying ? Please advise me to stop me worrying xx
Posts.Title: Lympth nodes

Posts.Content: Hi there and thank you for reading my post. What I want to ask is does anyone suffer from sore tired eyes? I can look at the computer screen or look down in general, then i end up nearly squinting but if I look up at the tv my eyes seem ok. Is this normal? I am currently on tomoxifan and have 4 more years et could this be a side effect from that?
Posts.Title: Tired eyes

Posts.Content: I had 4 out n a 5th that was a very slight tinge of blue n all clear from breast cancer !!! So that means it wnt gave gone up to my head or down into my body?  Thank you in advance  kat x
Posts.Title: Advice on Axillary Lymph Nodes Dissection / Lymph Nodes Removal

Posts.Content: Morning Guys,   think thats duscusting ting what your boss is wanting you to do!!!! I have just had the all clear from breast cancer well for now post op lets hope it stays this way for the next 5 yrs. i work for a large retailAmerican Company and my boss and company has been amazing. I DNt mean to gloat but I couldn't fault them. My journy started in April this year n my boss sent me home to visit my doctor who sent me for scans n biopsies. Anyway what I am tring to say is that my boss n area manager have been a 100% supportive and are currently looking after me very well indeed. If you have a sick note you cnt work as your not insured to work . Your work company sounds very hardh and not human and am very sorry your having to deal with this at this difficult time.
Posts.Title: Unsympathetic manager

Posts.Content: Just a question , was wondering why they DNt give the F and just  ECG in breast cancer treatment? Thank you
Posts.Title: Fec

Posts.Content: Has anyone in here hat a ct scan prior to treatment?
Posts.Title: Feeling better

Posts.Content: Hi Mistty, I finished my chemo back in July last year. I had 3 FEC followed with 3 Dozeytaxul. I lost my hair after the first FEC  Dozeytaxul caused my eyelashes n eyebrows to fall out. i had no side effects from either chemos except for some leg ache from the dozey chemo.  My hair has grown back now but totally differant to how it was before as it's curly :( am really trying to embrace the curls but sadly loosing hahah.  I then had 17 herceptins which I am still having at the mo n due to graduate in June. Also 15 sessions of rads which out of chemo or rads I would rather have chemo again as rads really made me tired n tbh I am still suffering :( hope all is going well with you ?  Kat xx

Posts.Content: Hi there and thank you in advance for you reading this. Currently taking tomoxifan and i am getting some real hot n clammy incidents. Does anyone else have this issue at all?  Many thanks kat

Posts.Content: Hello fellow  friends, I am one year on from my surgery and going for my first mamograme and i am feeling nervous The tumour respnded vey well to the chemo n pratcily dissapeared. Currently taking Tomoxifan for the next 5 years. Any one else insame boat as me?
